## large language model AND attack
| **Title** | **Date** | **Comment** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| **[Anti-Phishing Training (Still) Does Not Work: A Large-Scale Reproduction of Phishing Training Inefficacy Grounded in the NIST Phish Scale](http://arxiv.org/abs/2506.19899v2)** | 2025-09-01 | <details><summary>22 pa...</summary><p>22 pages, 9 figures, 2 tables, 2 appendices. Empirical study with N=12,511 participants at a financial technology firm. Reproduction study validating NIST Phish Scale and evaluating phishing training effectiveness</p></details> |
| **[MEGen: Generative Backdoor into Large Language Models via Model Editing](http://arxiv.org/abs/2408.10722v2)** | 2025-09-01 | ACL 2025 Findings |
| **[Network Modelling in Analysing Cyber-related Graphs](http://arxiv.org/abs/2412.14375v2)** | 2025-09-01 | <details><summary>16 pa...</summary><p>16 pages, 13 figures, to be published in Frontiers Complex Systems</p></details> |
| **[Membership Inference Attacks on Large-Scale Models: A Survey](http://arxiv.org/abs/2503.19338v3)** | 2025-08-31 | <details><summary>Prepr...</summary><p>Preprint. Submitted for peer review. The final version may differ</p></details> |
| **[Similarity between Units of Natural Language: The Transition from Coarse to Fine Estimation](http://arxiv.org/abs/2210.14275v2)** | 2025-08-30 | PhD thesis |
| **[I Stolenly Swear That I Am Up to (No) Good: Design and Evaluation of Model Stealing Attacks](http://arxiv.org/abs/2508.21654v1)** | 2025-08-29 | Under review |
| **[SoK: Large Language Model-Generated Textual Phishing Campaigns End-to-End Analysis of Generation, Characteristics, and Detection](http://arxiv.org/abs/2508.21457v1)** | 2025-08-29 | <details><summary>13 pa...</summary><p>13 pages, 3 tables, 4 figures</p></details> |
| **[FedSEA-LLaMA: A Secure, Efficient and Adaptive Federated Splitting Framework for Large Language Models](http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.15683v2)** | 2025-08-29 |  |
| **[CLUE-MARK: Watermarking Diffusion Models using CLWE](http://arxiv.org/abs/2411.11434v4)** | 2025-08-29 |  |
